feed.title: Hermosawave Photography
feed.subtitle: A series of daily landscape photographs by Daniel Sofer, 20 years running.

entry.title: Minato Mirai・みなとみらい
entry.content:
Looking over the Minato Mirai area of Yokohama, on a clear day from the Landmark Tower. The tall buildings in the distance are the Tokyo skyline.

晴れた日にランドマークタワーから横浜みなとみらい地区を望む。遠くに見える高いビルは東京のスカイライン。
entry.summary: Looking over the Minato Mirai area of Yokohama, on a clear day from the Landmark Tower. The tall buildings in the distance are the Tokyo skyline.

entry.title: Shinjuku Evening・夜の新宿
entry.content:
Looking northwest at Nishi Shinjuku and Nakano, from the Tokyo Metropolitan Government Building (Tocho).

東京都庁から西新宿、中野方面を望む。
entry.summary: Looking northwest at Nishi Shinjuku and Nakano, from the Tokyo Metropolitan Government Building (Tocho).

entry.title: Shonan・湘南
entry.content:
A hot, sunny day. Perfect for windsurfing off Kanagawa, just not great waves as depicted by Hokusai almost 200 years ago.😉

暑い晴れた日。神奈川沖でウィンドサーフィンをするには最適だが、北斎が描いたような素晴らしい波ではない。😉
entry.summary: A hot, sunny day. Perfect for windsurfing off Kanagawa, just not great waves as depicted by Hokusai almost 200 years ago.😉

entry.title: Station in Motion・動く人々
entry.content:
I always like taking pictures at this Akihabara Sobu Line platform, because it has really good natural light. This is a long exposure to show the dynamic movement of people getting on and off the train.

私はいつもこの秋葉原総武線のホームで写真を撮るのが好きだ。これは、電車に乗り降りする人々のダイナミックな動きを表現するための長時間露光だ。
entry.summary: I always like taking pictures at this Akihabara Sobu Line platform, because it has really good natural light. This is a long exposure to show the dynamic movement of people getting on and off the train.

entry.title: Suburban Tokyo・東京郊外
entry.content:
Looking east at area around Hachioji from Mt. Takao. Although still part of Tokyo, Mt. Takao is about halfway between central Tokyo and Mt. Fuji.

高尾山から八王子周辺を東に望む。高尾山は東京都の一部ではあるが、東京都心と富士山のほぼ中間に位置する。
entry.summary: Looking east at area around Hachioji from Mt. Takao. Although still part of Tokyo, Mt. Takao is about halfway between central Tokyo and Mt. Fuji.

entry.title: Lake Chuzenji・中禅寺湖
entry.content:
A day trip to Nikko including Lake Chuzenji above. Below, the Tohoku Shinkansen train, the Taisho Era (1912) JR Nikko Station, colorful swan paddle boats, and Ryuzu Falls. (Not shown, the two most popular places to visit: Toshugu Shrine and Kegon Falls 🤣)

中禅寺湖を含む日光への日帰り旅行。下は東北新幹線、大正時代のJR日光駅、カラフルな白鳥の手漕ぎボート、竜頭ノ滝。(写真には写っていないが、最も人気のある2つの観光スポット： 東照宮と華厳滝。🤣)
entry.summary: A day trip to Nikko including Lake Chuzenji above. Below, the Tohoku Shinkansen train, the Taisho Era (1912) JR Nikko Station, colorful swan paddle boats, and Ryuzu Falls. (Not shown, the two most popular places to visit: Toshugu Shrine and Kegon Falls 🤣)

entry.title: Morioka Castle Park・盛岡城跡公園

link.title: Morioka Castle Park・盛岡城跡公園

entry.content:
Bridge crosses what appears to have been the Edo era moat surrounding Morioka Castle. Only the castle ruins remain, and the grounds have been turned into a park.

江戸時代に盛岡城を囲んでいたと思われる堀に架かる橋。城跡だけが残り、敷地は公園になっている。
entry.summary: Bridge crosses what appears to have been the Edo era moat surrounding Morioka Castle. Only the castle ruins remain, and the grounds have been turned into a park.

entry.title: Usui Pass・碓氷峠見晴台
entry.content:
View of the mountains of Gunma Prefecture, from the Usui Pass Observation Platform in Karuizawa, a mountain resort town northwest of Tokyo.

群馬県の山々の眺め、東京の北西に位置する山岳リゾートの町、軽井沢の臼井峠展望台からの景色。
entry.summary: View of the mountains of Gunma Prefecture, from the Usui Pass Observation Platform in Karuizawa, a mountain resort town northwest of Tokyo.

entry.title: Split Screen
entry.content:
Looking southwest over Abalone Cove and Portuguese Bend in Rancho Palos Verdes. But you can see an interesting phenomena: the setting sun (way off-screen to the right) is blocked by the incoming fog on the right; yet on the left side the pink glow of sunset is still visible.

スプリット・スクリーン ランチョ・パロス・バーデスのアバローン・コーブとポルトギーゼ・ベンドを南西に望む。画面右の霧に遮られ、画面左には夕日のピンクの光が残っている。
entry.summary: Looking southwest over Abalone Cove and Portuguese Bend in Rancho Palos Verdes. But you can see an interesting phenomena: the setting sun (way off-screen to the right) is blocked by the incoming fog on the right; yet on the left side the pink glow of sunset is still visible.

entry.title: Sunstars
entry.content:
Sun peeks through low level clouds as it sets.

きらめく太陽 夕暮れ時、低い雲間から太陽が覗く。
entry.summary: Sun peeks through low level clouds as it sets.
